dcterms:creator: Jane X. Wang
Zeb Kurth-Nelson
Dhruva Tirumala
Hubert Soyer
Joel Z. Leibo
Remi Munos
Charles Blundell
Dharshan Kumaran
Matt Botvinick
dcterms:description: A contextual multi-armed bandit task where the agent must recall its past experience in a given context to exploit the best arm when the context reoccurs.
dcterms:title: Barcode Bandits

dcterms:creator: B. M. Lake
R. Salakhutdinov
J. B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: An episodic contextual bandits task where the contexts are drawn from Omniglot character classes, requiring the agent to recall previous instances of the class.
dcterms:title: Omniglot Bandits

dcterms:creator: Jane X. Wang
Zeb Kurth-Nelson
Dhruva Tirumala
Hubert Soyer
Joel Z. Leibo
Remi Munos
Charles Blundell
Dharshan Kumaran
Matt Botvinick
dcterms:description: A multi-armed bandit task where task components reoccur in arbitrary combinations, requiring the agent to compose memories of previously encountered task components.
dcterms:title: Compositional Bandits

dcterms:creator: Jane X. Wang
Zeb Kurth-Nelson
Dhruva Tirumala
Hubert Soyer
Joel Z. Leibo
Remi Munos
Charles Blundell
Dharshan Kumaran
Matt Botvinick
dcterms:description: A navigation task in a water maze where the agent must find a goal using contextual cues, allowing it to recall previous exploration to navigate efficiently.
dcterms:title: Contextual Water Maze

dcterms:creator: Nathaniel D. Daw
Samuel J. Gershman
Ben Seymour
Peter Dayan
Raymond J. Dolan
dcterms:description: A two-step task where the agent learns to execute model-based and model-free control using episodic cues to recall previous rewards.
dcterms:title: Episodic Two-Step Task
